component.name: Dust Racing 2D
component.summary: Traditional top-down car racing game including a level editor.

description.p: Dust Racing (Dustrac) is a tile-based, cross-platform 2D racing game written in Qt (C++) and OpenGL.

ul.li: 1-2 human players againts 11 challenging computer players
Split-screen two player game (vertical or horizontal)
Game modes: Race, Time Trial, Duel
Finishing in TOP-6 will unlock the next race track
Star ratings based on the best positions on each race track
Easy to create new race tracks with the level editor

description.p: Dust Racing comes with a Qt-based level editor for easy level creation. A separate engine, MiniCore, is used for physics modeling.
